title: Behavioral urbanism
text: Behavioral urbanism and its related area of study, behavioral architecture, is an <a href="Interdisciplinarity">interdisciplinary</a> field focused on the interaction between humans and the built environment, studying the effects of social, <a href="Cognitive%20bias">cognitive</a>, and <a href="emotion">emotion</a>al factors in understanding the spatial <a href="behavior">behavior</a> of <a href="Human%20behavior">individual</a>s.
